column5: Incredible! If you think about it.  We're all lazy.  Even the bears.  Why work for your dinner.
SO whats the limit on polar bears
OK, the site I got it off of, one guy fishes the west coast and says it is not a polar bear, but a Stellar Sea Lion. Could be. Who knows.  http://www.at-you.net/archives/polar-bear-steals-fish/
That looks like a leopard seal to me..  Definitely not a polar bear.  No claws are visible and it takes off with a big swoosh at the end.  Definitely a seal of some kind.
HAHAHAHA I remember the first time that clip came through here everyone swore it was a walrus.
Now watch this version.  <iframe width="480" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/2VhlaXIyeFA" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
